comment: wheat upfront, under the wheat was a vanilla and honey mixture, almost a salted caramel hint on the finish
I swear this always has the same main pieces, but it tastes different every time. less sweet then I remember and more butterscotch.

It looks like it’s bottled in a perfume bottle, and you’d pretty much be spot on. A nice sweet and floral taste with definite honey on the nose. For me a couple of drops of water reduced the slight alcohol sting to make it a very refreshing and smooth sipper.
Very nice whisky finished in Sauternes cask, sweet, floral medium finish definitely it is worth it to try
